hypothesis_content.title: Political Liquidity Divergence Signal
hypothesis_content.statement: When political uncertainty drives liquidity shifts (mentioned in news), BTC volatility compression precedes directional breakout. A 3-day Bollinger Band width < 0.1 combined with political liquidity news predicts a >5% move within 3 days with 70% accuracy in NEUTRAL regimes.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Political events create latent liquidity shifts that aren't immediately priced. Extreme volatility compression indicates a coiled spring. The combination of compression + political liquidity news creates high-probability breakout conditions.
entry_conditions: News sentiment score contains 'political' AND 'liquidity' with score > 0.3
Volume 5-day average is within 15% of 30-day average (not dead)

exit_conditions.take_profit: Price moves 5% in either direction from entry (directional agnostic)
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Price remains within 2% of entry after 3 days (no breakout)

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Breakout success rate < 60% over 20 instances with these exact conditions.
